name: Creative Writing
description: (Offered in English/Italian) A course designed to promote self-expression in Italian by involving students in writing shorter pieces in fiction and non-fiction and teaching the structure of the language in relation to the writing activity. Genres to be practised: the personal sketch, fable, apologue, short story, brief documentaries, and short plays. There will be an option of transforming the creative pieces into a screenplay which will be turned into a short film. Selected writings will be collected and published in a booklet. [24L, 52P, 24S]
